alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Clinton; Highland; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 9:22PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL BROWN, NORTHEASTERN ADAMS, SOUTH CENTRAL CLINTON, NORTHWESTERN PIKE, HIGHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EST... At 922 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near Lynchburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Lynchburg, Marshall, Bainbridge, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Belfast, Rocky Fork Point, Cynthiana, Highland Holiday, Russell, New Market, Fayetteville, Sinking Spring, St. Martin, Rocky Fork Lake, Poplar Grove, Danville in Highland County, Rainsboro and Buford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Clinton; Highland; Pike; Ross
